title: Metacognition-Based Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Learning Strategies and College-Level Reading Skills
context.additional_context: Blended format combining face-to-face workshops with online modules, including self-directed learning plan creation and feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) throughout the learning process.
Learners can clearly set personalized learning goals and strategies and translate them into actionable plans
Learners can continuously revise and improve self-regulated learning strategies based on feedback

resources: Access rights to digital learning journal platform

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
